about_the_game:
In this sequel, save the holidays (again)!

It seems like Saturnalia is always in crisis, and there are always some Holiday Elves that need to save the day. In the same vein as the first/base game, manage your team, solve conflicts, and make sure that the children of the world get their toys! They've been working super hard at being good all year, so don't disappoint those lil' brats, okay?

Unlike the first game, this one is completely narrative based. Over the course of five weeks, help all six of the new Holidays Elves navigate their lives, their troubles, and their relationships before the big day. Or at least try not to cause any nervous breakdowns.

  • Six new characters to interact with
  • Five story points - each interaction you make will determine the fate of the holidays!

Unlike the first game, this one is completely narrative based. Over the course of five weeks, help all six of the new Holidays Elves navigate their lives, their troubles, and their relationships before the big day. Or at least try not to cause any nervous breakdowns.
